name: Arthur Abon
text:
On a more serious note: "Do not listen only to people who have the same opinion as you do" and "seek out different opinions" are very important, but they do nothing unless you sincerely listen with respect for the other party. Otherwise, you'd just be listening to yourself argue to some noise you don't even care to even try to understand.
I know. I've had a conversation where my thoughts were belittled and thought of as just a flight of fancy *sigh* .
